Description:
Tasks include but not limited to:Continuously scanning the market to support decision making in terms of pricing and positioning 
Monitor competitors’ marketing communication tactics to provide analysis and recommendations
Develop & execute the SEO strategy for the business
Manage social media channels as needed & develop copy and designs as required
Contact leads generated from online marketing activities
Handle communication with these leads starting from the day they submit their contact information through the website’s form, close deals whenever applicable and stay in touch with them until they receive their apartmentsBenefits include:Salary + Commission
Flexible working hours
Friendly work environmentSkills
Skills:
Smart & dedicated
Proven experience as a marketing executive or at least demonstrate potential
Good understanding of market research techniques, data analysis and statistics methods
Thorough knowledge of strategic planning principles and marketing best practices
Proficient in MS Office and marketing software (e.g. CRM)
Familiarity with social media and web analytics (e.g. WebTrends)
Excellent communication and people skills
Strong organizational and time-management abilities
Creativity and commercial awareness
